sourcesContent:
import styles from './ThreadComponent.module.scss' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useParams } from 'react-router'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; import { getThread } from '../../features/threadSlice'; function ThreadComponent() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const { thread } = useSelector((state) => state.thread) const [authSettings, setAuthSettings] = useState(false) const { threadId } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getThread({ threadId })) }, []) return (
Аноним 19/09/2022 #{thread.id}

{thread.name}

{thread.desc}

Аноним 19/09/2022 №2414244

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit. Impedit, sint. Voluptate laudantium accusantium quidem corporis quaerat aliquam. Fugit, eum perspiciatis delectus id consequatur tenetur quod quidem deleniti tempora vel unde?

Загрузить больше
Отправить Error
); } export default ThreadComponent;
